resources.string: Here at 2Get, we are helping to create an easy experience for keeping track of the most common items that you might need throughout your week. \n\nWhether you are going to the store to just pick up some milk, or need to make a list of your entire food shopping before you leave the house, 2Get is here to help you prepare.

We want you to love our product! That's why we want you to let us know of anything that can be improved.

If you have a new idea to make your life easier while using our app, let us know! We also hate to see something that may be making your life more difficult. This is why if you let us know any bugs or problems, we will begin to work on them right away!

Please email us with any improvements, bugs or just to tell us that you love the app! We would love to hear from you!

string.name: help_detail_1
string.u: Click on items to add them to your list

resources.string: Need to Add a Custom Item?
You got Something on your List?
Want to share your List with someone?

string.name: help_detail_3
string.u: Swipe to the left to check your List!

string.name: help_detail_4
string.u: Click on it to check it off!

resources.string: Want to Clean Up your List?

string.name: help_detail_7
string.u: Use the refresh button to remove your purchased items!
